wikipedia_page.main: Gary Shelton (born 21 March 1958) is an English former footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: Andrew Marc Shelton (born 19 June 1980) is an English footballer who played in the Football League for Chester City. He is the son of former Sheffield Wednesday midfielder Gary Shelton, who was assistant manager at Chester when Andy was part of the first-team squad from 1998 to 2000.
